description: Changelog for Hivemind - Local-first observable orchestration for agentic development

changes.description: Add native typed tool engine (`src/native/tool_engine.rs`) with explicit `ToolContract` metadata (`name`, `version`, input/output schemas, scope/permission envelope, timeout/cancellable policy) and deterministic registry dispatch
Implement Sprint 44 built-in native tools: `read_file`, `list_files`, `write_file` (scope-gated), `run_command` (policy-gated deny-by-default), `git_status`, and `git_diff`
Integrate typed native tool execution into the native adapter/registry flow, including `HIVEMIND_TASK_SCOPE_JSON` propagation and deterministic non-retryable policy/scope failure classification
Add unit/property/performance baseline coverage for schema validation, policy/scope gates, deterministic replay behavior, and tool dispatch/validation latency
Mark Sprint 44 roadmap items complete and update architecture/design docs plus `hivemind-test` manual artifacts for native typed tool contracts and policy enforcement behavior

Add native runtime invocation event family: `AgentInvocationStarted`, `AgentTurnStarted`, `ModelRequestPrepared`, `ModelResponseReceived`, `ToolCallRequested`, `ToolCallStarted`, `ToolCallCompleted`, `ToolCallFailed`, `AgentTurnCompleted`, `AgentInvocationCompleted`
Persist native model/tool payloads as hash-addressed blobs under `~/.hivemind/blobs/sha256/<prefix>/<digest>.blob`, with digest/byte-size/media-type metadata in events
Wire native invocation tracing into runtime execution reports and registry event emission; preserve legacy flow/task semantics by treating native events as additive observability data
Surface native event payload types in CLI/server event label mappings and category projections
Add replay/idempotence regression coverage for native events + blob references, including successful and failed native tool-call paths
Update Phase 4 roadmap and architecture/design docs for native event contracts, blob provenance strategy, capture-mode policy, and replay semantics
Introduce native runtime contracts under `src/native` (`ModelClient`, `AgentLoop`, `NativeRuntimeConfig`, `NativeRuntimeError`) with deterministic harnessing via `MockModelClient`
Add runtime selection observability primitives: `RuntimeSelectionSource` and `RuntimeCapabilitiesEvaluated` event payload
Extend `runtime list` and `runtime health` to report adapter capabilities and runtime selection source, including native adapter support
Integrate `native` adapter into runtime resolution precedence (task -> flow -> project -> global) while keeping existing external adapters unchanged
Add native loop unit tests and runtime selection/capability event coverage; harden flaky scope-violation integration path for deterministic CI behavior
Update Phase 4 roadmap and architecture/design docs for native runtime foundations, capability reporting, and runtime capability event semantics
Add skill registry integration commands: `global skill registry registry-list`, `search`, `registry-inspect`, `pull`, and `pull-github` for discovering and importing skills from external registries
Integrate with three skill registries: agentskills.io (official standard), SkillsMP (community marketplace), and GitHub repositories (anthropics/skills, openai/skills, etc.)
Update CLI semantics and capabilities documentation for skill registry operations
Enforce append-only semantics at the SQLite layer by rejecting `UPDATE`/`DELETE` on canonical `events` rows via DB triggers
Add `events verify` integrity/parity diagnostics and `events recover --from-mirror --confirm` for explicit canonical SQLite reconstruction from the JSONL mirror
Add regression coverage for mirror-based SQLite recovery flow (`events verify` mismatch detection, confirmation gate enforcement, and post-recovery parity restoration)
Add regression coverage proving direct SQL mutation attempts on `db.sqlite` fail with `events_append_only_violation` and preserve event history
Support `project governance init --project <project>` as a flag-compatible selector alongside existing positional syntax
Document DB-level append-only guarantees and clarify `events list` JSON/YAML response envelope semantics
Add backward-compatible task command arity support for legacy beta harnesses: `task start|complete|retry <project> <task-id>`
Add compatibility parsing for legacy `task complete --success/--message` flags, mapping failed legacy completions to explicit task close behavior
Serialize retry requests as `task_retried` while keeping `task_retry_requested` as a deserialization alias for historical event logs
Extend `events list` and `events stream` with `--error-type <category>` filtering for `error_occurred` payloads
Add regression coverage for legacy task command arity, `events --error-type` filtering, and retry event payload compatibility aliases
Update CLI semantics for legacy task forms, retry event naming (`task_retried`), and `events` error-type filtering
Harden `project governance replay --verify` to fail with `governance_replay_verification_failed` when replayed governance projections are missing on disk
Extend `project governance diagnose` with deterministic drift checks from governance repair planning so missing or malformed governed artifacts are reported in health results
Emit `error_occurred` events for invalid `task start` and `task retry` operations (`task_not_in_flow`, retry misuse paths) to improve anti-magic observability
Extend `GovernanceSnapshotRestored` telemetry with `stale_files` and `repaired_projection_count`, and lock migration observability with no-op `governance_storage_migrated` emission coverage
Increase `events list` default limit from 50 to 200 and clarify retry mode help (`--mode clean|continue`) for better operator discoverability
Add regression coverage for replay/diagnose detection of missing governance artifacts and for `error_occurred` emission on invalid task start/retry operations
Update CLI semantics and governance runbook with retry-mode semantics, events list default limit, and replay verification failure behavior for missing projection files
Migrate canonical event persistence to `~/.hivemind/db.sqlite` using transactional SQLite operations, while preserving deterministic sequence/EventId semantics
Switch `Registry::open_with_config` to the new `SqliteEventStore` backend and retain existing replay/filter/stream behavior
Keep `events.jsonl` as an append-only compatibility mirror for operator inspection and legacy tooling
Add SQLite storage tests for append/reload and JSONL mirror emission; validate full test suite under DB backend
Add Phase 3.5 DB migration roadmap, update sprint execution runbooks, quickstart, principles, and CLI semantics storage contract documentation
Add governance replay and recovery command families: `project governance replay`, `project governance snapshot create|list|restore`, and `project governance repair detect|preview|apply`
Introduce bounded governance recovery snapshots persisted under project governance storage with optional periodic reuse windows and explicit confirmation-gated restore flow
Implement deterministic governance drift classification and repair planning/application against canonical event history, including recoverable/unrecoverable issue accounting
Emit governance recovery telemetry events: `GovernanceSnapshotCreated`, `GovernanceSnapshotRestored`, `GovernanceDriftDetected`, and `GovernanceRepairApplied`
Add Sprint 40 unit/integration coverage for governance snapshot restore, replay verification, and deterministic repair workflows
Update Phase 3 roadmap and architecture/design/quickstart/runbook docs for governance replay/recovery contracts and operator procedures
Extend `events list` and `events stream` with governance-aware payload filters: `--artifact-id`, `--template-id`, and `--rule-id`
Add `project governance diagnose <project>` for operator-facing governance diagnostics with structured health/issues output
Implement diagnostics checks for missing artifacts, invalid template references, and stale/missing graph snapshots with actionable recovery hints

Add Sprint 41 unit/integration coverage for governance event filter selectors, diagnostics paths, replay integrity after governance context activity, and concurrent artifact operations under active flows
Update roadmap/architecture/design/quickstart docs, add governance runbooks, and publish Sprint 41 manual + fresh-clone `hivemind-test` report artifacts

Add deterministic attempt context assembly pipeline that freezes ordered governance inputs (constitution, system prompt, skills, project documents, graph summary) and records explicit excluded sources (`project_notepad`, `global_notepad`, `implicit_memory`)

Emit Sprint 39 context observability events (`AttemptContextOverridesApplied`, `AttemptContextAssembled`, `AttemptContextTruncated`, `AttemptContextDelivered`) with manifest/input/delivery hashes and retry-manifest linkage metadata
Resolve latest template instantiation at attempt start, apply explicit per-task document include/exclude overrides, and persist immutable manifest payloads with budget/truncation telemetry
Extend `hivemind attempt inspect --context` to return structured context provenance (`retry`, `manifest`, `manifest_hash`, `inputs_hash`, `delivered_context_hash`)
Add Sprint 39 integration coverage for deterministic context input hashing across equivalent runs, template+override document resolution semantics, and retry manifest linkage visibility
Update Phase 3 roadmap, architecture/design/quickstart docs, Sprint 39 manual test artifacts, and sprint report for deterministic attempt context contracts

Implement constitution enforcement engine that evaluates graph snapshot evidence against `forbidden_dependency`, `allowed_dependency`, and `coverage_requirement` rules with severity-aware outcomes (`hard`, `advisory`, `informational`)
Enforce constitution hard-rule gates at checkpoint completion and merge boundaries (`prepare`, `approve`, `execute`, including PR-mode execution path)
Add explicit `hivemind constitution check --project <project>` command for manual severity-aware policy validation
Emit `ConstitutionViolationDetected` events with correlation IDs, gate context, rule identifiers, severity, evidence, remediation hints, and blocked status
Add Sprint 38 unit/integration coverage for constitution severity reporting, checkpoint hard-gate blocking, merge gate blocking, and CLI check output semantics
Update Sprint 38 roadmap/report, architecture/design/quickstart docs, and manual `hivemind-test` artifacts for constitution enforcement behavior and observability contracts

Integrate `ucp-api` codegraph extraction (pinned to a specific unified-content-protocol git revision) and materialize `graph_snapshot.json` artifacts with profile metadata, canonical fingerprints, repository provenance, and static structure+blocks projections
Add `hivemind graph snapshot refresh <project>` command and structured output for snapshot lifecycle refresh results
Emit `GraphSnapshotStarted|Completed|Failed|DiffDetected` events and auto-trigger snapshot refresh on repository attach, checkpoint completion, and merge completion
Gate constitution init/validate/update on current graph snapshot integrity and staleness checks with actionable recovery hint (`Run: hivemind graph snapshot refresh <project>`)
Add Sprint 37 regression coverage for manual refresh artifact lifecycle, constitution stale-snapshot rejection, and automatic snapshot triggers from checkpoint/merge flows
Update Sprint 37 roadmap completion, CLI/event documentation, manual test artifacts, and sprint report to reflect UCP graph snapshot integration contracts
Add top-level constitution lifecycle commands: `hivemind constitution init/show/validate/update` with explicit confirmation gates for mutations
Implement Constitution Schema v1 with strict YAML validation for compatibility/version fields, partition definitions, rule types, and semantic references
Emit constitution lifecycle events (`ConstitutionInitialized`, `ConstitutionUpdated`, `ConstitutionValidated`) including digest, revision, actor attribution, and mutation intent
Project state projection now records constitution digest/schema/version metadata (`constitution_digest`, `constitution_schema_version`, `constitution_version`, `constitution_updated_at`)
Add Sprint 36 integration coverage for confirmation gating, constitution lifecycle commands, validation outcomes, event observability, and projection metadata updates
Update roadmap, architecture/design docs, manual test artifacts, and Sprint 36 report for constitution core behavior and audit contracts
Add project governance document lifecycle commands (`create`, `list`, `inspect`, `update`, `delete`), task-level attachment include/exclude controls, and project notepad CRUD operations
Add global governance registries for skills, system prompts, templates (including `instantiate`), and global notepad CRUD commands
Implement governance artifact schema validation, immutable document revision history, and strict template reference resolution with actionable failures
Emit and project `TemplateInstantiated` lifecycle events across CLI labels, state replay handling, and server/UI payload mappings
Inject explicitly attached project documents into runtime execution context while keeping project/global notepad content non-injectable by default
Treat empty scaffold notepad files as logically absent in notepad show output (`exists=false`, `content=null`) after delete operations
Add Sprint 35 integration coverage for governance artifact lifecycle, runtime attachment context inclusion, notepad non-injection, and template instantiation observability
Update CLI semantics, architecture capabilities, event model, roadmap checklist state, and Sprint 35 manual validation artifacts/reporting
Add `project governance init`, `migrate`, and `inspect` commands for managing project-level governance artifacts with observability events
Migrate worktree storage from repo-local `.hivemind/worktrees` to global `~/hivemind/worktrees` with HIVEMIND_WORKTREE_DIR override support
Implement resilient file locking with retry mechanism for flow integration operations to reduce transient contention failures
Add legacy governance migration support to import older repo-local governance files into global storage
Add unit and integration coverage for governance CLI lifecycle, event observability, and migration semantics
Document project governance CLI semantics and update worktree paths to reflect global storage location

Centralize runtime failure handling to classify errors, emit RuntimeErrorClassified/RuntimeRecoveryScheduled events, and schedule backup-runtime recovery for transient failures (rate limiting/timeouts)
Preserve stdout/stderr on nonzero runtime exits so parser-based rate-limit/auth detection has full execution context
Detect runtime auth/rate-limit failures from stderr even when wrapped runtimes return exit code 0 and checkpoint completion is otherwise missing
Add registry coverage for rate-limit recovery scheduling and zero-exit stderr auth-failure classification, plus expanded tick_flow regression validation
Document runtime error first-class observability, recovery scheduling semantics, and Sprint 30 production-hardening validation outcomes
Add `flow restart` to recreate aborted flows from the same graph with copied run mode, dependencies, and flow-level runtime defaults
Add `attempt list` and `checkpoint list` commands to improve attempt/checkpoint discoverability for operators and automation
Improve `worktree cleanup` output to report how many worktrees were cleaned (or would be cleaned in dry-run mode)
Add unit and integration coverage for flow restart semantics, attempt/checkpoint listing, and cleanup feedback UX
Update quickstart and CLI semantics for flow restart, attempt/checkpoint list commands, and cleanup output behavior
Refresh beta testing fix report templates in `ops/process` and `ops/reports` with standardized validation, DX, and PR/CI tracking sections
Extend `runtime_started` events to include the effective runtime prompt payload and command flags used to launch the runtime
Add integration coverage asserting `runtime_started` carries prompt and flags for flow tick runtime execution
Document `runtime_started` prompt/flags payload fields in CLI semantics and event replay design docs

Harden scope enforcement for wrapper runtimes by capturing per-attempt repository and ambient baselines, validating post-run drift, and emitting scope violations for unauthorized out-of-worktree writes
Complete `attempt inspect --context` output to return assembled retry context when available in event history
Require `worktree cleanup --force` for running flows, add `--dry-run` support, and emit `worktree_cleanup_performed` audit events
On flow abort, transition active task executions to failed with explicit `flow_aborted` failure events and attempt correlation
Record flow-correlated `error_occurred` events when `merge prepare` is blocked by `flow_not_completed` preconditions

Add regression coverage for scope violations outside worktrees, attempt context inspection, running-flow cleanup force requirements, abort-state consistency, merge precondition observability, and dependency-chain readiness ordering
Update scope enforcement, CLI semantics, and quickstart docs to reflect current scope-detection mechanics, cleanup safety flags/events, abort transitions, and retry-context inspection
Add flow and task run modes (`manual`/`auto`) with scheduler enforcement so manual tasks are not automatically dispatched
Add inter-flow dependency edges and auto-start dependent auto-mode flows when upstream flows complete
Add runtime defaults and overrides at global/project/flow/task scope with explicit worker/validator role selection and deterministic precedence
Add `task set-run-mode`, `flow set-run-mode`, `flow add-dependency`, `flow runtime-set`, and `runtime defaults-set` commands plus role-aware `runtime health` arguments
Add merge execution mode selection (`local` or `pr`) with optional CI monitoring, auto-merge request, and pull-after behavior for PR mode
Extend registry coverage for task manual mode, runtime precedence, and dependent-flow auto-start behavior
Update quickstart, CLI semantics, and architecture docs for run modes, inter-flow dependencies, runtime precedence, and PR merge execution options
Deprecate interactive flow ticks with explicit `interactive_mode_deprecated` errors and guidance to run non-interactive `flow tick`
Add regression coverage for runtime output capture when runtime command arguments include nested quoting
Expand runtime projection heuristics to recognize TODO/DONE prefixes and common runtime narrative status lines
Add projection tests for TODO prefix snapshots and runtime narrative status lines plus registry coverage for interactive deprecation
Update CLI semantics and architecture docs to document interactive deprecation and current flow tick behavior
Add beta testing fix report for tier-4 RUN-003/RUN-004/RUN-005 stabilization outcomes
Extend `events list` and `events stream` with correlation filters (`--graph`, `--flow`, `--task`, `--attempt`) and RFC3339 time-window filters (`--since`, `--until`)
Enhance EventFilter matching with timestamp bounds to support deterministic historical queries and streaming windows
Add event store coverage for time-range filtering and CLI integration coverage for new event query/stream filters and invalid time-range handling
Mark Phase 29 complete in roadmap and update CLI/quickstart/capabilities docs for correlation and time-range observability queries
Add Phase 29 execution report including manual `hivemind-test` validation with captured start/end timestamps and event query evidence
Add Codex, Claude Code, and Kilo runtime adapters with shared execution/interactive semantics and health checks
Introduce `hivemind runtime list` and `hivemind runtime health` for adapter discovery and diagnostics
Support task-level runtime override via `task runtime-set` with event-sourced TaskRuntimeConfigured/TaskRuntimeCleared state transitions
Runtime execution now resolves effective runtime per task (override or project default) while preserving existing TaskFlow event semantics and projection behavior
Harden runtime event projection by normalizing ANSI/control-prefixed output so command/tool markers are observable from real runtime streams
Extend registry tests for runtime catalog coverage, codex adapter execution, and task runtime override precedence
Mark Phase 28 complete and update quickstart/runtime/CLI semantics docs for multi-runtime operation
Provision task worktrees across all attached repositories and propagate dependency branch integration in each repo before runtime execution
Inject multi-repo runtime context/env (`HIVEMIND_PRIMARY_WORKTREE`, `HIVEMIND_ALL_WORKTREES`, per-repo worktree env vars) so agents can operate across repos in a single attempt
Enforce repository scope per repo during verification; writes in undeclared/read-only repos now fail the attempt
Extend merge prepare/execute to multi-repo flows with taskflow-level all-or-nothing merge guarantees and best-effort rollback of partially merged repos
Add registry coverage for multi-repo merge preparation and atomic merge failure handling
Mark Phase 27 complete in roadmap and document Phase 27 runtime/scope mechanics in design docs
Introduce concurrency governance in Registry::tick_flow with multi-dispatch scheduling, scope-aware conflict telemetry, and global concurrency cap parsing
Expose --max-parallel on flow tick and --max-parallel-tasks on project runtime-set, plus surface new scheduling telemetry via server API
Emit ScopeConflictDetected/TaskSchedulingDeferred events and persist max_parallel_tasks policy in ProjectRuntimeConfigured
Rewrite Phase 26 roadmap, update architecture/design/quickstart docs to describe concurrency governance and global caps
Extend unit coverage for scheduling conflicts/global cap parsing and document manual hivemind-test validation scenarios
